title: Activity of extracts and isolated compoundsTrichilia catiguaagainst clinically relevantcandidaspecies.
abstract: To evaluate theinvitroantifungal activity of extracts and compounds fromTrichilia catiguaagainst clinically relevantCandidaspecies, notablyCandida glabrata, and investigate possible mechanisms of action using electron microscopy andin silicotechniques.
